layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x54
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x54
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x38
      LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,0) size 784x38
        LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,0) size 784x38 [color=#008000] [border: (15px solid #008000) (3px solid #008000)]
          LayoutText {#text} at (3,15) size 220x19
            text run at (3,15) width 220: "There should be no red on this page."
